unet_trainer Module¶

UnetTrainer class uses U-Net model, which is originally proposed in this arXiv 1. Implemented trainer module uses this Git 2 code as reference work.

References¶

1

https://arxiv.org/abs/1505.04597

2

https://github.com/milesial/Pytorch-UNet

UnetTrainer class¶

class farabio.models.segmentation.unet.unet_trainer.UnetTrainer(config)[source]¶

U-Net trainer class. Override with custom methods here.
